about.title: About Vida-Tea
about.subtitle: Founded by Erika & Mercedes
about.story: Our story begins with a passion for wellness and cultural tea traditions. We believe that tea is more than just a beverage - it's a journey of discovery, wellness, and cultural connection.
about.mission: Our mission is to bring premium organic teas to everyone, everywhere, while honoring the rich cultural traditions that make each tea unique.
about.values: We value authenticity, wellness, cultural respect, and community connection.
